descriptionHtml:
Nice cabin by the river between Riverwood and Whiterun.

Note: this mod is only simply tested by myself so it might not be perfect! But i like the cabin so i thought i would share it on this community all questions are welcome.

It includes

1 - Outside the cabin there is a mine, crafting area, fishing place, little campfire
2 - Main floor Living area with some nice details, includes bar, 1 female follower that can be married with, desk, place to chill, storage, cooking.
3 - 1 floor down contains master bedroom, guest bedroom, food storage, bathroom + a nude female is bathing there! Its possible to marry her, a secret room includes all shrines and stones.
4 - Basement contains 2 beds and a seperate crafting area and enough storage to keep a little order in all the stuff collected and crafted.
5 - Enough mannequins and weapon display. Also i made the option to fast travel while in side the cabin. WARNING the Safe on the master bedroom contains 50000 gold if you dont like this watch yourself and dont take it.

Video made by Hodilton
[youtube]W7Uc-ki-u40[/youtube]


Install - Uninstall

Just install with nexus! Or drag and drop the cabin file into you skyrim DATA map and run skyrimlauncher to make sure the cabin file is selected.
author: Hardnekkig
